price: Kuma akwai daga mutãne wanda yake riƙon kinãye, baicin Allah, suna son su, kamar son Allah, kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni ne mafiya tsananin so* ga Allah. Kuma dã waɗanda** suka yi zãlunci, suna ganin lõkacin da zã su ga azãba, da cewa lalle ne ƙarfi ga Allah yake duka, da cẽwa lalle neAllah Mai tsananin azãba ne.
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَندَادٗا يُحِبُّونَهُمۡ كَحُبِّ ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَشَدُّ حُبّٗا لِّلَّهِۗ وَلَوۡ يَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِذۡ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَنَّ ٱلۡقُوَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
footnotes: * So mai kai ga karɓar umurni daga abin son, wanda ba Allah ba shi ne shirki da kãfirci. Amma so sabõda ihsãnin abin son, kõ dõmin zamansa sãlihi dõmin a yi kõyi da aikinsa na cikin haddõdin sharĩ'a, bã shirki ba ne, dõmin bai kai yadda mũminai ke son Allah ba. ** Ãyõyi na l65 da l66 da 167 duka ɗinke suke ga ma'anoninsu. version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-nāsi man yattakhidhu min dūni al-lahi andādan yuḥibbūnahum kaḥubbi al-lahi wa-alladhīna āmanū ashaddu ḥubban lillahi walaw yarā alladhīna ẓalamū idh yarawna al-ʿadhāba anna al-quwata lillahi jamīʿan wa-anna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿadhābi
